introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
<0>  Hack This Out is a web-based <1>Hacking Lab.
 Cyber Security is hard and boring, but we believe that it can be <2>Fun and <3>Exciting.
  The journey will be <4>Rough and <5>Exhausting.
 So, we prepared <6>Gaming experience for your fun and exciting journey.

gamingRules.title: Gaming Rules
list: You complete a machine by <0>Hacking</0> and <1>Capturing the Flag</1>.
You get rewarded <0>Experience Points (EXP)</0> by completing machines.
You can get <0>Hints</0> from each machine, but there will be a penalty.

gameModes.title: Game Modes
gameModes.machine:
<0>   Machine
<1>  The Basic! You have to hack vulnerable machines.
  Find the <2>Flag and complete the machine.
gameModes.contest:
<0>   Contest
<1>  The Competition! Compete against other players.
  Each contest has a <2>Period.
  The <3>Quickest player who completes all given tasks in the period, gets to <4>Win.
